attributes.action: remove Hazel Blears for any cabinet or ministerial office. The position requires someone of honour and integrity, of which Ms Blears has shown none with respect to her expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The MP's expenses system was created to assist MP's undertake the role of an MP. The assumption was that MP's would behave honourably and would therefore require little monitoring. Ms Blears has shown a lack of integrity and honour on this and should be removed from her ministerial position.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister and Government do not control the pay or allowances of MPs - the current system is administered by the House of Commons. Therefore the Number 10 website can not accept petitions relating to MPs’ expenses.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
